title: Panda2
description: This project originated from a joint endeavor during my time at technical school, where my instructors and I sought to establish a dedicated platform for technical students. This platform aims to serve as a comprehensive resource center, providing students with all the necessary materials to support their academic journey.

title: Erazmus+
description: During my time at technical school, I had the opportunity to participate in an Erasmus+ program exchange. To encourage other students to join the project, I created a visual representation, which I subsequently utilized as social media content.

title: Business cards for ForRest
description: I also had the pleasure of designing business cards for the company.

title: School Assistant
description: A glimpse into our groundbreaking project designed to streamline the daily workflow for students and educators.

title: SnkrsDeals
description: A close friend approached me seeking a logo design for his shoe restoration business. I presented him with several options, and he ultimately selected this one.

title: Miękus Show
description: Eye-catching key visual promoting Miękus Show - a talk show featuring diverse guests.

title: Home Sewage Treatment Plant or Septic Tank?
description: Graphic design project for JFC Polska - marketing graphic

title: MKWM
description: My friend and I founded a company that provides photography and videography services. The graphic showcases our logo and behind-the-scenes photos from a photoshoot, offering a glimpse into our creative process.

title: School President
description: In support of my younger brother's campaign for school president, I designed a series of eye-catching election posters that played a significant role in his victory. Here's one of them.

title: KPR Markovia ROKIS
description: Poster promoting the girls' handball club KPR Markovia ROKIS.
